data.actual_result: You need to open the sidebar memeber list one before all users can be displayed in server settings
data.expected_result: Everyone should be here no matter if you opened the sidebar member list first or not
data.short_description: Not everyone is present in the server settings member list until the sidebar member list is opened once
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a lazy guild you can manage - Kill Discord - Reopen Discord - Don't open member list, go straight to Server settings - Go to Members - Notice there are a lot of missing people - Now go back, and open and close the sidebar member list (no need to scroll down, just open and close) - Go back to server settings member list. Now everyone is here
